item.title: ‘The Diplomat’ Sets Season 3 Release Date as Latest Teaser Sees Keri Russell Warn of “Terribly Flawed” New POTUS
item.description: Netflix offers more of a glimpse into the next episodes of the political thriller, which has added Bradley Whitford as the husband of Allison Janney’s Grace Penn.

item.title: The Atlantic Festival Adds ‘The Diplomat’ Season 3 First Look and Panels With Tom Hanks, Sterlin Harjo (Exclusive)
